title: Teacher Training Program Design Applying Critical Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Critical pedagogy training program to enhance math education effectiveness in multicultural settings. In-service teachers engage in VR simulations of real classroom scenarios to perform critical reflections on power structures and knowledge systems

learning_goals: Participants can analyze power dynamics in mathematics classrooms and explain how learner backgrounds (language, culture) influence knowledge construction
Participants can empathize with marginalized students' experiences through VR simulations and propose at least three strategies for inclusive lesson design
Participants can critically evaluate Eurocentric knowledge frameworks in existing mathematics curricula and create revised instructional plans addressing multicultural learners' needs
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
